pr_title: KOGITO-2741 Enrich TrustyService with data types information from TraceEvents

timeline.bodyText: Would it be possible split these long lines to make code more readable?
timeline.author: jiripetrlik

timeline.bodyText:
It's quite hard to understand what are the created objects and what it's really tested. Isnt't better to create a resource file and deserialize it?
If this is not a stable implementation and you prefer to create the things programmatically, do you mind to create a ticket so that we keep track that we have to change it in the future?
timeline.author: r00ta

replies.bodyText:
This is something that @danielezonca asked me to do.
Imho we should discuss which approach we want to use once for all when he comes back, so that from that moment we'll be all on the same page.
replies.author: kostola

timeline.bodyText:
Is this the rest response object?
Do we need this information in UI side?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: Well...I assumed so but I am not sure actually...should I remove it?
replies.author: kostola
